name: Keelbreaker Crab
description: The Keelbreaker Crab is a Huge crustacean with impressive natural armor and massive pincers capable of grappling and crushing foes.
memorable: It can unleash a powerful magical wail, causing fear, psychic damage, or stunning effects, while also being a menace to structures.
goals: To dominate its environment and destroy barriers or structures with its siege capabilities.
relations: It may be encountered near water, possibly with other aquatic monsters or creatures that thrive in similar environments.
environment: Found in aquatic and terrestrial areas, highlighting its amphibious nature.
strengths: High durability and the ability to deal double damage to objects and structures.
weaknesses: Low intelligence limits its tactical capabilities and social interactions.
attacks: Uses powerful pincer attacks and can grapple foes with its massive pincers.
most_powerful_ability: Wail ability that can frighten, damage, or stun enemies within range.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to sense nearby creatures without sight.
skills: Has proficiency in Perception and Stealth, making it capable of noticing hidden creatures and remaining undetected.
additional_information: Living figureheads grant it combat advantages and unique abilities.
Each figurehead has resistances and immunities to certain damage types.
If all figureheads are destroyed, it cannot use the Wail ability.
Effective in both combat and siege scenarios.
Representing a significant threat due to its size and magical abilities.
test_queries: massive crab that causes psychic damage
aquatic monster with magical wail ability
giant crab capable of grappling enemies
crab with magical figureheads and blinding wail
